name: tracetrack
description: Introducing our groundbreaking app powered by facial recognition technology. It empowers citizens to report suspicious individuals, aiding law enforcement in locating missing persons and wanted criminals. Submit photos/videos, and our API matches them against a comprehensive database, alerting authorities for immediate action. Streamlining safety, together.
author: Harsh Vardhan, Manav Bansal, Anshuman Anand, Anand Bodra
